page.title: 10CAPERNWRAY HALL
page.content: {Oliver Marton,}the first owner of this 19th Century estate could not have thought that today his house would be the{British Headquaters}of a World Wide evangelical organization called {The Missionary of Torchbearers.}An estimated{3000 people a year}come from all over the world to combine a holiday in the beautiful grounds with Bible study at the centre.There are a wide range of facilites in the{176 {acres:}There is an indoor swimming pool which is open to the general public at certain times;tennis courts;basketball courts and football pitches.
